name: fastest-expressjs-validator
author: nextyfine-dev

scripts.build: bun run build:cjs && bun run build:esm
scripts.build:cjs: bun x tsc -p tsconfig.cjs.json && mv source/cjs/index.js source/cjs/index.cjs
scripts.build:esm: bun x tsc -p tsconfig.json && mv source/esm/index.js source/esm/index.mjs

description: fastest-expressjs-validator is a robust and easy-to-use middleware package for Express.js applications that simplifies request validation. With this package, you can effortlessly define validation schemas for request body, URL parameters, and query parameters using a straightforward syntax. It leverages the power of the fastest-validator library to validate incoming requests efficiently.
